Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnswerListenableInterface
public class Model extends Object implements AnswerListenableInterface
Class for Model in MVC Pattern. Holds the state of the game and part of the game logic and rules

  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      protected Model(List<Player> players, List<Island> islands, List<Cloud> clouds, MotherNature motherNature, List<CharacterCard> characterCards, int coinReserve, Board<Professor> startingProfessorBoard, StudentBag bag, int numStudentToMove, boolean completeRule)
      Model constructor. Initializes all parameters of the class that determine the rules and the starting point of the match
      Parameters:
      players - List of players
      islands - List of the islands
      clouds - List of the clouds
      motherNature - Mother Nature instance
      characterCards - List of the Character Cards
      coinReserve - Value of the starting coin reserve
      startingProfessorBoard - The starting professors board, holding all the professors of the game, to be moved in the player's schools
      bag - The student bag holding all the student pawns
      numStudentToMove - The number of students to move, depending on the number of players
      completeRule - True if the match is to be played with the full rules

  • Method Details

    • setWizard

      public void setWizard(int playerId, Wizard wizard)
      Sets the Wizard chosen for the player
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that has made the choice
      wizard - The wizard chosen by the user

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(int playerId, int choice) throws CardException
      Plays the selected Assistant Card
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that has played the card
      choice - Assistant Card ID chosen
      Throws:
      CardException

    • playCharacterCard

      public CharacterCard playCharacterCard(int playerId, int choice) throws NotEnoughCoinsException, CardException
      Plays the selected Character Card
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that has played the card
      choice - Character Card ID chosen
      Returns:
      the played Character card
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCoinsException - if the player doesn't have enough coins
      CardException - if the Character Card is invalid

    • moveStudentToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentToDiningRoom(int playerId, int choice) throws InvalidActionException
      Moves the chosen student to the playerId's Dining Room
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player to move the student to his Dining Room
      choice - Student to move into the Dining Room
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public void moveStudentToIsland(int playerId, int studentChoice, int islandChoice) throws InvalidActionException
      Moves the chosen student to the selected island
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that makes the move
      studentChoice - Choice of the student
      islandChoice - Choice of the island
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the pawn chosen is invalid

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int playerId, int stepsChoice) throws MotherNatureStepsException
      Moves MotherNature by "stepsChoice" steps
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that makes the move
      stepsChoice - Number of steps to move mother nature to
      Throws:
      MotherNatureStepsException - If the movement of Mother Nature requested is not valid

    • addStudentsToClouds

      public void addStudentsToClouds()
      Adds to all the clouds numStudentToMove students chosen randomly from the Student Bag

    • takeStudentsFromCloud

      public void takeStudentsFromCloud(int playerId, int choice) throws CloudException
      Takes all the students from the chosen cloud and puts them in the playerId's School Entrance
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player to move the pawns to
      choice - Chosen cloud
      Throws:
      CloudException - if the requested cloud is invalid (is empty or does not exist)

    • extraAction

      public void extraAction(int playerId, int... values) throws Exception
      Perform an extra action required by the play of a Character Card
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that requests the action
      values - Values required by the sub-methods of the appropriate Character Card
      Throws:
      Exception - If any Exception is thrown by the sub-methods
      See Also:
      • Handler

    • resetLastAssistantCards

      public void resetLastAssistantCards()
      Resets the Last Played Assistant Cards info

    • returnStudentsToBag

      protected void returnStudentsToBag(Color color, int num)
      Given a selection of the color, returns "num" students of "color" color to the Student Bag
      Parameters:
      color - Chosen color of the students
      num - Number of students to return to bag

    • exchangeStudentsDiningRoomEntrance

      protected void exchangeStudentsDiningRoomEntrance(int playerId, int entrancePawnPosition, Color color) throws InvalidActionException
      Exchanges Students from the Dining Room to the Entrance
      Parameters:
      playerId - ID of the player that requests the action
      entrancePawnPosition - Position of the pawn in Entrance
      color - Color of the student (for the dining room selection)
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

      public boolean isThereWinner()
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one winner

    • update

      private void update()
      Fires an AnswerEvent, answering an Update request, with the instance of this (model). If there is a winner, notifies the players by firing a "winner" Answer Event
      See Also:
      • AnswerEvent

    • resumeFromDisk

      protected void resumeFromDisk()
      Helper method when a saving is loaded and a match is resumed, creating a new Answer Listenable and a new list of winners

    • groupOfIslands

      private int groupOfIslands()
      Returns:
      the number of groups of islands

    • findWinner

      public void findWinner()
      Finds a winner by checking the number of towers for each player and comparing them. Sets appropriately the list of winners Uses helper method getPlayerWinningRanking

    • getPlayerWinningRanking

      private int getPlayerWinningRanking(Player player)
      Returns a value of the winning ranking for the desired player
      Parameters:
      player - Player to check
      Returns:
      Number of professors - number of towers

    • getPlayerNumTowers

      private int getPlayerNumTowers(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - Player to check
      Returns:
      the number of towers in the Player's Tower board
